text: @realDonaldTrump @seanhannity YOU, @realDonaldTrump tanked the economy with your terrible action on the coronavirus and you make yourself look bad on a daily basis, every time you open your mouth, you don’t need help from anyone else.  #TrumpIsANationalDisgrace
